name: The Tale of Aisha Qandisha Demo
name_original: The Tale of Aisha Qandisha Demo
description:
The Tale of Aisha Qandisha (TTAQ) is a 2d text-based, hand-drawn click and point game.

You will explore the Old Medina of Fez and interact with characters from the North African, Moroccan folklore.

You can talk to NPCs, help with their tasks, [explore parts of the Old Medina, and play puzzles to enable extra content in the game. (coming soon)]

For the sake of preserving the authentic Moroccan experience, titles of some of the items were kept in their native language (Darija).

However, descriptions are provided throughout the game so it would be easy for non Darija-speakers to understand the context.

How To Play:

  • Use the left mouse button to move around the place and collect items (if needed).
  • The right button allows interactions with doors, npcs, and items' description.

For a better experience, please start the game in "full screen mode". Plus, the game might take some time loading for the first time.
